pages.404: But no worries! Our ostrich is looking everywhere while you wait safely.
pages.403: Halt! Thou art endeavouring to trespass upon a realm not granted.
pages.500: But relax! Our cat is here to play you some music.

description.confirm: Welcome aboard! Your account is set up. To unlock full access, verify your email. Look for our confirmation email in your inbox, click the link, and start exploring today.
description.register: Create an account in a few simple steps. Register with your email and password to access all features, manage your profile, and start using our services securely.
description.sing_in: Sign in to explore your dashboard, update your info, and stay connected.

popover.login_action: Already have an account, sign in. If you don’t, you can create one from the login screen and then continue.
popover.home_action: From there you can start fresh, find key sections, or navigate to your dashboard and help center.
popover.resend_action: Click to send a new email with your verification link. If it doesn’t arrive within a minute, check your spam.
popover.register_action: Click to create your account and get started. It takes just a moment—enter your email and a password, then you’re in.

auth.email: Please enter a valid email address
auth.password_not_shorter: Must be at least 8 characters long
auth.not_match: Passwords don’t match — Enter the same password in both fields

prisma.is_existing_user: An account with this email already exists. Please log in with your credentials or reset your password if you cannot access your account.
prisma.not_existing_user: No account found with this email address. Please check for typos or sign up to create a new account.
prisma.account_not_activated: Your profile is not yet activated. Please confirm your email address to complete activation and start using all features.

error.message: The server is not responding at the moment. Your request could not be completed. Please check your connection or try again later.

zod.message: A rare server validation error occurred. In most cases, this issue requires immediate attention from our support team. Please contact support right away. support@higabase.com
